name: Sticker Ninja Bot
description: Deploy Sticker Ninja Bot on Heroku.

BOT_WEBHOOK.description: Telegram bot webhook, where app-name is replaced with your app name.

STICKER_COUNT_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of stickers that can be sent in a single pack. Default is 100.

DATABASE_TYPE.description: The type of database to use. Currently mysql, pgsql, and sqlite are supported.
